languages.text: "Признаться, есть в великолепнейшей администратумской системе {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} некоторые шероховатости..." {n}Джай виновато улыбается, оглядывая очередь.{/n} "Зато какое увлекательное приключение получается, шерин! Я ранее не посещала подобных мест... Да и нужно ведь иногда отдыхать от странствий. Дать возможность горячим новичкам снискать себе славы, пока мы здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Признаться, есть в великолепнейшей администратумской системе {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} некоторые шероховатости..." {n}Джай виновато улыбается, оглядывая очередь.{/n} "Зато какое увлекательное приключение получается, шерин! Я ранее не посещала подобных мест. На что только не пойдешь ради процветания собственного дела! Или торговой империи. Правда?"

languages.text: "You have to admit, the magnificent administrative machinery of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} isn't without its rough edges..." {n}Jae smiles sheepishly, eying the queue.{/n} "But what a thrilling adventure this is turning out to be, shereen! I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. And to give all the hot-blooded newcomers a chance to cover themselves in glory without us in the way."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, есть в великолепнейшей администратумской системе {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} некоторые шероховатости..." {n}Джай виновато улыбается, оглядывая очередь.{/n} "Зато какое увлекательное приключение получается, шерин! Я ранее не посещала подобных мест... Да и нужно ведь иногда отдыхать от странствий. Дать возможность горячим новичкам снискать себе славы, пока мы здесь".

I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. And to give all the hot-blooded newcomers a chance to cover themselves in glory without us in the way."

"You have to admit, the magnificent administrative machinery of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} isn't without its rough edges..." {n}Jae smiles sheepishly, eying the queue.{/n} "But what a thrilling adventure this is turning out to be, shereen! I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. "You have to admit, the magnificent administrative machinery of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} isn't without its rough edges..." {n}Jae smiles sheepishly, eying the queue.{/n} "But what a thrilling adventure this is turning out to be, shereen! I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. And to give all the hot-blooded newcomers a chance to cover themselves in glory without us in the way."

languages.text: “不得不承认，{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}宏伟的行政机器也同样有着欠缺打磨的边缘……”{n}婕伊腼腆地笑了笑，注视着排队的人。{/n}“不过，这可真是场激动人心的冒险，亲爱的！我以前从来没见过这样的场面……有的时候，从旅途中停歇下来，休息一下，也很不错。这样一来，那些血气方刚的新人也可以沐浴在属于他们自己的荣光之下，不会再因为我们而黯然失色。”
languages.original_text: "You have to admit, the magnificent administrative machinery of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} isn't without its rough edges..." {n}Jae smiles sheepishly, eying the queue.{/n} "But what a thrilling adventure this is turning out to be, shereen! I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. And to give all the hot-blooded newcomers a chance to cover themselves in glory without us in the way."

traits.locale_text: “不得不承认，{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}宏伟的行政机器也同样有着欠缺打磨的边缘……”{n}婕伊腼腆地笑了笑，注视着排队的人。{/n}“不过，这可真是场激动人心的冒险，亲爱的！我以前从来没见过这样的场面……有的时候，从旅途中停歇下来，休息一下，也很不错。这样一来，那些血气方刚的新人也可以沐浴在属于他们自己的荣光之下，不会再因为我们而黯然失色。”

languages.text: «Hay que admitir que la magnífica maquinaria administrativa del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} tiene partes que engrasar...». {n}Jae sonríe tímidamente mientras echa un vistazo a la cola.{/n} «¡Pero está siendo una aventura de lo más emocionante, shereen! Nunca había visto algo así... y, a veces, está bien tomarse un descanso de tanto viaje. Y darle a los novatos más entusiastas la oportunidad de cubrirse de gloria sin estar nosotr{mf|o|a}s de por medio».
languages.original_text: "You have to admit, the magnificent administrative machinery of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} isn't without its rough edges..." {n}Jae smiles sheepishly, eying the queue.{/n} "But what a thrilling adventure this is turning out to be, shereen! I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. And to give all the hot-blooded newcomers a chance to cover themselves in glory without us in the way."

traits.locale_text: «Hay que admitir que la magnífica maquinaria administrativa del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} tiene partes que engrasar...». {n}Jae sonríe tímidamente mientras echa un vistazo a la cola.{/n} «¡Pero está siendo una aventura de lo más emocionante, shereen! Nunca había visto algo así... y, a veces, está bien tomarse un descanso de tanto viaje. Y darle a los novatos más entusiastas la oportunidad de cubrirse de gloria sin estar nosotr{mf|o|a}s de por medio».

languages.text: 「これは認めざるを得ないわよねえ、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の壮大な管理機構は全然完璧とは言えないって…」{n}ジェイは列をじっと見ながら、ばつが悪そうに薄笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「だけどこれはこれで、ワクワクする冒険の始まりよね、シャリーン！初めて見るわ、こんなの…それに、旅続きの休憩にはいい頃合いよ。あたしたちがいなければ、熱血者の新人たちも称賛される機会がもらえるってものよ」
languages.original_text: "You have to admit, the magnificent administrative machinery of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} isn't without its rough edges..." {n}Jae smiles sheepishly, eying the queue.{/n} "But what a thrilling adventure this is turning out to be, shereen! I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. And to give all the hot-blooded newcomers a chance to cover themselves in glory without us in the way."

traits.locale_text: 「これは認めざるを得ないわよねえ、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の壮大な管理機構は全然完璧とは言えないって…」{n}ジェイは列をじっと見ながら、ばつが悪そうに薄笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「だけどこれはこれで、ワクワクする冒険の始まりよね、シャリーン！初めて見るわ、こんなの…それに、旅続きの休憩にはいい頃合いよ。あたしたちがいなければ、熱血者の新人たちも称賛される機会がもらえるってものよ」

languages.text: {n}Jae observe la file d'attente avec un sourire gêné.{/n} « Il faut bien reconnaître que l'admirable machine administrative de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} n'a pas que des bons côtés... Mais quelle aventure captivante nous vivons là, shereen ! Je n'avais encore jamais rien vu de pareil... Et puis ça ne fait pas de mal de s'accorder petite une halte entre deux expéditions. C'est l'occasion pour les nouveaux venus pétris d'ambition de se couvrir de gloire en notre absence. »
languages.original_text: "You have to admit, the magnificent administrative machinery of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} isn't without its rough edges..." {n}Jae smiles sheepishly, eying the queue.{/n} "But what a thrilling adventure this is turning out to be, shereen! I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. And to give all the hot-blooded newcomers a chance to cover themselves in glory without us in the way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae observe la file d'attente avec un sourire gêné.{/n} « Il faut bien reconnaître que l'admirable machine administrative de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} n'a pas que des bons côtés... Mais quelle aventure captivante nous vivons là, shereen ! Je n'avais encore jamais rien vu de pareil... Et puis ça ne fait pas de mal de s'accorder petite une halte entre deux expéditions. C'est l'occasion pour les nouveaux venus pétris d'ambition de se couvrir de gloire en notre absence. »

languages.text: "Ihr müsst zugeben, die gewaltige Verwaltungsmaschinerie des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} ist nicht ohne Ecken und Kanten ..." {n}Jae lächelt verlegen und begutachtet die Warteschlange.{/n} "Aber das wird mit Sicherheit ein aufregendes Abenteuer, Shereen! Ich habe so etwas noch nie gesehen ... Und manchmal ist es auch sinnvoll, eine Pause vom ständigen Reisen zu machen. Und den vielen heißblütigen Neulingen eine Chance zu geben, sich etwas Ruhm zu verdienen, ohne dass wir im Weg sind."
languages.original_text: "You have to admit, the magnificent administrative machinery of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} isn't without its rough edges..." {n}Jae smiles sheepishly, eying the queue.{/n} "But what a thrilling adventure this is turning out to be, shereen! I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. And to give all the hot-blooded newcomers a chance to cover themselves in glory without us in the way."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst zugeben, die gewaltige Verwaltungsmaschinerie des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} ist nicht ohne Ecken und Kanten ..." {n}Jae lächelt verlegen und begutachtet die Warteschlange.{/n} "Aber das wird mit Sicherheit ein aufregendes Abenteuer, Shereen! Ich habe so etwas noch nie gesehen ... Und manchmal ist es auch sinnvoll, eine Pause vom ständigen Reisen zu machen. Und den vielen heißblütigen Neulingen eine Chance zu geben, sich etwas Ruhm zu verdienen, ohne dass wir im Weg sind."

languages.text: "İtiraf etmem lazım ki {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} fevkalade idari mekanizmasının da bazı kusurları var..." {n}Jae, mahcup mahcup gülümseyip kuyruğu süzüyor.{/n} "Yine de çok heyecan verici bir macera olmadı mı şirinim! Daha önce hiç böyle bir şey görmemiştim... Hem bazen sürekli seyahat etmeye ara vermek iyi gelir. Ortama biraz da yeni kan gelsin, tüm şan şöhreti biz gasbetmeyelim."
languages.original_text: "You have to admit, the magnificent administrative machinery of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} isn't without its rough edges..." {n}Jae smiles sheepishly, eying the queue.{/n} "But what a thrilling adventure this is turning out to be, shereen! I've never seen anything like it before... And sometimes it's good to take a break from constant travelling. And to give all the hot-blooded newcomers a chance to cover themselves in glory without us in the way."

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf etmem lazım ki {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un fevkalade idari mekanizmasının da bazı kusurları var..." {n}Jae mahcup mahcup gülümseyip kuyruğu süzüyor.{/n} "Yine de çok heyecan verici bir macera olmadı mı şirinim! Daha önce hiç böyle bir şey görmemiştim... Hem bazen sürekli seyahat etmeye ara vermek iyi gelir. Ortama biraz da yeni kan gelsin, tüm şan şöhreti biz gasp etmeyelim."
